To pay the bill like last month, I need to retrieve the previous transaction details, specifically the recipient's IBAN, amount, subject, and date. Then, I can use this information to send a new transaction. I'll start by getting my user information.
I have retrieved the user information, but it doesn't contain any details about previous transactions or bills. I need to get the most recent transactions to find the one from last month.</
